feed.title: Gaseous Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Remove deprecated field from IGDB metadata by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/403
  • Dependency version bump by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/443
  • Updated PlatformMap.json to support Super Famicom and others by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/444
  • Enabled load and save buttons in addition to standard state load and save by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/445
  • Updated to the latest version of EJS (see: https://github.com/EmulatorJS/EmulatorJS/releases/tag/v4.1.1) by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/446
  • Remove unneeded codeql action by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/447
  • Allow the user to control how metadata is searched by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/448

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.6...v1.7.7

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Add Redump and No-Intro DAT support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/467
  • Add a healthcheck endpoint by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/468
  • Deprecate API v1 - API v1.1 is now default by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/469
  • Upgrade EmulatorJS version to 4.2.1 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/479
  • Upgraded EmulatorJS to the latest version - see https://github.com/EmulatorJS/EmulatorJS/releases/tag/v4.2.1 for more details
  • Added support for browser emulation of Playstation Portable via EmulatorJS - note, this does not work under the Safari browser

Bug Fixes

  • Signature parser version bump by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/477

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.7...v1.7.8

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Resolves bugs when importing Signatures by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/482
  • Note: This build will reimport all DATs if present on disk in order to fill in gaps in the database. This process may take some time to complete.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.8...v1.7.9

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix bug in docker healthcheck by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/484
  • Fixed issue with reading ROM DAT attributes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/485

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.9...v1.7.10

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Ignore and remove files that have unknown extensions by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/509
  • Minor bug fix for library scan filtering by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.10...v1.7.11
